Text:
Wow! Thanks for this.  I recently read that Steffen Schleiermacher has composed a new one titled "The Late Piano Works Vol.1 - Triadic Memories" in accordance to guidelines from Morton Feldman.  I wonder if you would ever possess this CD and upload it here.  That would be awesome!

Thanks again for this upload!!!
I have more than 90% downloaded but there's no more seeders!!! Please, need more seeders! Thanks for the album, I've heard it before and it's wonderful. I cant waaaaiiiittttt!!!!
